products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Grey - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Rimini (blackout), grey - roller blind the rimini (blackout) blinds offer the latest in high quality, easy-to-use fabrics, and the rimini (blackout) in grey is no different, combining the sleek fabric with an effortlessly fashionable light stone grey that
products.productdescription: The rimini (blackout) blinds offer the latest in high quality, easy-to-use fabrics, and the rimini (blackout) in grey is no different, combining the sleek fabric with an effortlessly fashionable light stone grey that is easy to integrate with a range of tastes and styles. Offset the grey against granite worktops and slate floors in a contemporary kitchen for a striking yet natural contrast in tones. Alternatively, use it as a great neutral backdrop to bold reds or greens in the lounge or dining room.
